channel.title: Greek Polytonic on Openbox :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: Writing greek polytonic,monotonic and ancient, modern spell checking on LibreOffice and Openbox. set the key Open the file ~/.config/openbox/rc.xml with a text editor. e.g. geany ~/.config/openbox/rc.xml go to line 294 last row with /keybind and add the lines bellow <keybind key="C-1"> <action name="Execute"> <command>sh ~/.polytonic</command> <startupnotify> <enabled>yes</enabled> <name>Polytonic/Monotonic</name> </startupnotify> </action> </keybind> Save the file Create the polytonic file Create the file ~/.polytonic geany ~/.polytonicand paste the lines #!/bin/sh # Dimitris Tzemos <djemos@slackel.
